tagline: SendGrid API Wrapper allows you to use the SendGrid functionality.
description: SendGrid is a cloud-based SMTP provider that allows you to send email without having to maintain email servers.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: title
args.info: The title of your camapign.

args.name: subject
args.info: The Email subject of your camapign.

args.name: sender_id
args.info: The sender ID obtained from Sender Management.

args.name: list_ids
args.info: Optional: The list IDs,  which will receive your email. You can indicate more than one list with comma-separated.

args.name: segment_ids
args.info: Optional: The segment IDs,  which will receive your email. You can indicate more than one segment with comma-separated.

args.name: categories
args.info: Optional: This is a category that you can set for your emails. You can create up to 10 different categories with comma-separated.

args.name: suppression_group_id
args.info: Optional: The suppression group ID.

args.name: custom_unsubscribe_url
args.info: Optional: The custom unsubscribe URL.

args.name: ip_pool
args.info: Optional: The name of pool IP.

args.name: html_content
args.info: Optional: The HTML content of campaign.

args.name: plain_content
args.info: Optional: The plain text of campaign.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: campaign_id
args.info: The id of the campaign.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: start_time
args.info: Optional: Refers start of the time range in unix timestamp when a spam report was created (inclusive).

args.name: end_time
args.info: Optional: Refers end of the time range in unix timestamp when a spam report was created (inclusive).

args.name: limit
args.info: Optional: Limit the number of results to be displayed per page.

args.name: offset
args.info: Optional: Paging offset. The point in the list to begin displaying results.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: delete_all
args.info: Optional: delete all spam reports by setting to 'true'. Default 'false'.

args.name: emails
args.info: Optional: delete some spam reports by specifying the comma-separated email addresses.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: email
args.info: Email address of spam report entry.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.info: Email address of spam report entry.

args.info: The id of the campaign.

args.info: Optional: The First Name of the recipient.

args.name: last_name
args.info: Optional: The Last Name of the recipient.

args.name: custom_field
args.info: Optional: The created custom fields with comma-separated. To indicate custom field and its value use the pattern [custom_field_name]:[value]. For example: age:30,occupation:developer etc.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: recipients
args.info: separated values with | according with pattern 'email'=value;'first_name'=value;'last_name'=value;'custom_fields'=value|'email'=value;'first_name'=value;'last_name'=value;'custom_fields'=value etc. To indicate custom_fields use the pattern [custom_field_name]:[value], for example: age:30,occupation:developer etc.

args.name: conditions
args.info: The list of conditions separated with semicolon values according with pattern 'field':value,'value':value,'operator':value,'and_or':value;'field':value,'value':value,'operator':value,'and_or':value etc.

args.name: api_key

args.name: template_id
args.info: The ID of the template.

args.name: name
args.info: Name of the new version. Max 100 characters.

args.name: subject
args.info: Subject of the new version. <%subject%> tag must be present.

args.name: html_content
args.info: HTML content of the new version. <%body%> tag must be inside the content. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed for html content.

args.name: plain_content
args.info: Text/plain content of the new version. <%body%> tag must be inside the content. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed for plain content.

args.name: active
args.info: Optional: 0 - Inactive, 1 - Active. Set the new version as the active version associated with the template. Only one version of a template can be active. The first version created for a template will automatically be set to Active.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.

args.name: template_id
args.info: The ID of the template.

args.name: version_id
args.info: The ID of the version.

args.name: name

args.name: subject
args.info: Optional: Subject of the new version. <%subject%> tag must be present.

args.name: html_content
args.info: Optional: HTML content of the new version. <%body%> tag must be inside the content. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed for html content.

args.name: plain_content
args.info: Optional: Text/plain content of the new version. <%body%> tag must be inside the content. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed for plain content.

args.name: active
args.info: Optional: 0 - Inactive, 1 - Active. Set the new version as the active version associated with the template. Only one version of a template can be active. The first version created for a template will automatically be set to Active.

args.name: api_key
args.info: The API key obtained from SendGrid.
